Do you experience any pain in the legs or feet while at rest? 2. Do you have uncomfortable aching, fatigue, tingling, cramping or pain in your feet, calves, buttocks, hip or thigh during walking / exercise ? 3. If Yes to question 2, does the pain go away when you stop walking / exercising? 4. Do your feet get pale, discolored or bluish at any time during the day? 5. Do you have an infection, skin wound or ulcer on your leg or foot that is slow to heal over the past 8-12 weeks? 6. Do you have high cholesterol or other blood lipid (fat) problems or require cholesterol medication? 7. Do you have high blood pressure or take medication to reduce blood pressure? Questions Answer
